introText: The Ministry of Public and Business Service Delivery provides government services to citizens and businesses, including ServiceOntario locations and digital government services.
descriptionText: The Ontario Ministry of Public and Business Service Delivery spent $1.0B in fiscal year (FY) 2023-24, representing 0.5% of the $206.6B in total provincial spending. This investment supports service delivery and government operations.
roleText: Accessible government services are essential for citizens and businesses. This ministry operates ServiceOntario, manages government IT systems, and ensures Ontarians can access the services they need efficiently and conveniently.
programsDescription: The Ministry of Public and Business Service Delivery operates programs including ServiceOntario locations, online government services, consumer protection, information management, and digital government initiatives.
